preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 64 g of Germanium using an analytical balance. 
 2. Weigh 84 g of Scandium. 
 3. Weigh 64 g of Silicon. 
 4. Weigh 64 g of Terbium. 
 5. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine all ingredients evenly. Use a spatula to ensure homogeneity.
